name: softwayapp-marketplace
description: Complete development toolkit with 32+ skills, 4 commands, and 3 agents for enterprise workflows

analyze.description: Comprehensive code quality analysis with actionable insights

deploy.description: Automated deployment with environment-specific configurations and rollback support

font.description: Download Pretendard font variants (Regular, Medium, SemiBold, Bold) with automatic path detection

test.description: Run comprehensive test suite with coverage analysis and reporting

github:issue.description: Create GitHub issue with auto type detection (bug/feature/task)

github:pr.description: Intelligent PR workflow - Test/Build/Lint → Auto-classify → Branch separation → PR creation → Merge → Cleanup

init:expo.description: Initialize Expo project with setup guide

init:next.description: Initialize Next.js project with setup guide

init:react.description: Initialize React project with auto library setup and CLAUDE.md

api-generator.description: Generate NestJS modules with Clean Architecture, CQRS patterns, and automatic API documentation

clean-architecture-scaffolder.description: Generate complete Clean Architecture project structure for NestJS with 4-layer separation (API, Application, Domain, Infrastructure)

cqrs-generator.description: Automatically generate CQRS pattern files (Commands, Queries, Events, Handlers) for NestJS applications

database-migration.description: Generate database migrations for NestJS with Prisma, TypeORM, and automated rollback support

error-handler.description: Apply consistent error handling patterns with NestJS Exception Filters, logging, and monitoring integration

performance-optimizer.description: Analyze and optimize NestJS backend performance with Interceptors, Cache Manager, and database query optimization

ci-cd-setup.description: Automatically configure CI/CD pipelines for GitHub Actions, GitLab CI, or Jenkins

docker-optimizer.description: Optimize Docker images for size, security, and build performance

k8s-deployment.description: Generate Kubernetes manifests and Helm charts with best practices

monitoring-setup.description: Setup monitoring stack with Prometheus, Grafana, and alerting

project-init-pipeline.description: Automated project initialization pipeline for Expo and Next.js with Atomic Design structure, dependency management, and folder documentation

api-docs-generator.description: Generate API documentation from OpenAPI/Swagger specs or code comments

changelog-generator.description: Generate and maintain CHANGELOG.md from git commits and conventional commits

jsdoc-generator.description: Generate comprehensive JSDoc/TSDoc documentation for code

readme-generator.description: Generate comprehensive README.md with badges, installation, usage, and examples

accessibility-audit.description: Automated WCAG 2.1 accessibility audit with a11y best practices and ARIA validation

component-generator.description: Generate React/Vue components with TypeScript, styled-components, and storybook integration

font-download.description: Download Pretendard font variants (Regular, Medium, SemiBold, Bold) to specified directory with parallel download optimization

responsive-design.description: Apply responsive design patterns with mobile-first approach and breakpoint management

state-management.description: Implement state management patterns with React Context, Zustand, or Redux Toolkit

github:issue.description: Create GitHub issue with auto type detection (bug/feature/task)

github:pr.description: Intelligent PR workflow - Test/Build/Lint → Auto-classify → Branch separation → PR creation → Merge → Cleanup

coverage-analyzer.description: Analyze test coverage and identify untested code paths with visualization

e2e-test-builder.description: Build end-to-end test scenarios with Playwright or Cypress

mock-data-generator.description: Generate realistic mock data for testing with Faker.js and JSON Schema

test-generator.description: Automatically generate unit and integration tests with Jest, Vitest, or Mocha

code-security-audit.description: Comprehensive code security audit with SAST and secure coding practices validation

dependency-check.description: Check dependencies for known vulnerabilities (CVE) with automated updates

secrets-detection.description: Detect hardcoded secrets, API keys, and credentials in code and git history

vulnerability-scan.description: Automated OWASP Top 10 vulnerability scanning with security best practices

setup-executor.description: Parse claude.md and execute setup instructions automatically
